      • sentenceToWords

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> sentenceToWords(java.lang.String sentence)
        Get a list of words from a sentence.
        Parameters:
        sentence - A sentence in String.
        Returns:
        A list of lowercase words in String, ordered accordingly. Punctuation marks are discarded.

      • getTokens

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTokens(java.lang.String sentence)
        Get a list of words from a sentence using PTBTokenizer.
        Parameters:
        sentence - A sentence in String.
        Returns:
        A list of lowercase tokens in String.

      • sentenceToNumber

        public static java.lang.String sentenceToNumber(java.lang.String sentence)
        Try parsing an English number to numeric number.
        Parameters:
        sentence - input sentence probably is a english number
        Returns:
        string of numeric number

      • getMatch

        public static java.lang.String getMatch(java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> it1,
                                        java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> it2)
        Utility function for deciding whether two String iterable has one match.
        Parameters:
        it1 - Input that needs to be matched
        it2 - Template that input matched against
        Returns:
        matched item in it2, or null if no match found
